title: Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses, Android TV Smart Glasses with 360" Micro-OLED Display, Google Play, Media Streaming, HDCP Support & Cloud Gaming, Console, Android, iOS, Windows Compatible
descriptions:
Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses

Bring big‑screen immersion anywhere with Rokid AR Joy Pack, lightweight AR glasses that pair cinematic visuals with effortless streaming and gaming.

Key features
- Panoramic 360" Micro‑OLED display: Enjoy a theater‑scale view with vivid color and crisp detail in a featherlight 75 g frame.
- Broad device compatibility: Works with Android, iOS, and Windows devices for plug‑and‑play versatility.
- Android TV 12 built in: Access apps and content through a familiar interface with Google Play support.
- Stream your favorites: HDCP‑compliant playback for Hulu, Disney+, Peacock, and more.
- Cloud gaming ready: Stream and play via supported cloud gaming platforms for console‑class fun on the go.
- Eye comfort certified: TüV Rheinland Eye Comfort certification and integrated diopter adjustment from 0.00D to −6.00D help reduce eye strain and let many users view without prescription glasses.
- Flexible connectivity: Use USB‑C for direct connection, or the included HDMI and wireless adapters for broader compatibility.

What’s included
- Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses
- USB‑C cable
- HDMI adapter
- Wireless adapter
- Quick start guide

Why you’ll love it
- Big screen, small footprint: Transform any space into a private cinema or gaming lounge without a TV.
- Travel friendly: Lightweight design makes it ideal for flights, commutes, and couch sessions.
- Ready to watch and play: Access Google Play apps, major streaming services, and cloud gaming out of the box.

Specifications
- Display: 360" Micro‑OLED (virtual screen)
- Weight: 75 g
- Operating system: Android TV 12
- HDCP: Supported
- Compatibility: Android, iOS, Windows
- Eye comfort: TüV Rheinland certified
- Diopter adjustment: 0.00D to −6.00D
- Connectivity: USB‑C, HDMI adapter, wireless adapter

Note: App availability, streaming access, and cloud gaming performance may vary by region, subscription, and network conditions. Ensure your source device supports video output over USB‑C or use the included adapters as needed.
